text: @narendramodi @BillGates @gatesfoundation With respect to you sir i would like to tell u sir that in this panademic situation of covid-19 going for the past 2 months our respective companies which was closed on during sampoorna lockdown 1 from 25th march is to be opened we have got only rs5000 salary not our full salary
